author: Doug Bandow
title: Yemen is Shattered and the U.S. Helped the Saudis Break It
description: Even with a cease-fire on the horizon it may never recover, thanks to the stupefying Western support for the Kingdom. The post Yemen is Shattered and the U.S. Helped the Saudis Break It appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: Even with a cease-fire on the horizon it may never recover, thanks to the stupefying Western support for the Kingdom.Five years ago the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia invaded neighboring Yemen. The conflict was supposed to be quick and simple, over in a few weeks. N… [+9993 chars]
